events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Anna for further handling.
Hello! I’m Anna and I’ll be assisting you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 5 business days and send you a confirmation email.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick help. I will wait for the confirmation email.
Your refund has been completed and the amount should appear on your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received without any issues, please let us know if you need more assistance.
Since the refund was processed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather feedback about your support experience with us.
I completed the survey and rated my experience excellent. Thank you for your prompt support!
This case has been archived automatically as it has been closed for more than five days.
